To be at an Intermediate level, we suggest implementing the Active Directory service. This service unifies the user authentication, the access to resources, applications and data a sole user account. We seek more control over the user accounts, managing them a centralized site.

It is recommended to define an automated process for the distribution of security patches. Likewise, standardize operating system images and implement centralized solutions to manage mobile devices. Finally, limit the use of operating systems in the devices to a maximum of two versions. This way you will have greater control over the devices deployed in your corporate network.

It is suggested the use of antivirus software in the desktop devices, as well as a centralized firewall for the protection of the devices on the network. Configure your servers in such a way that they can provide automated network services (DNS and DHCP) and define monitoring processes for critical servers of your infrastructure. This way you will protect your network against malware, you will improve the management of IP addresses and domain name resolution. Also, you will achieve better control of your critical servers, preventing decreases in performance or interruptions in service.

Implement processes and practices for change and support management. Defining guidelines for incident management (both detection and mitigation), changes, services and configurations will help you to provide a disciplined process for introducing changes in the IT environment with minimal interruptions to the operations in operation.

Implement practices and processes to create security backups and restore solutions of critical serves. In this way you will have backups for all critical information on your servers in case of loss or failure.
Develop security policies, risk assessments and procedures for incident management. This set of actions will minimize the impact of damages and/or losses of your organization's data and resources.

It is recommended to implement group policy settings (GPO) in Active Directory. The use of GPO eases the deployment in a quick and efficient manner regarding security settings and updates to the devices in the organization.

Automate the deployment process of operating systems in your platform. Adopt as a practice to maintain the two latest versions of Microsoft operating systems in all devices, and conduct tests to applications (in-house and third party) to prove their level of integrity with the operating systems. Make sure that the communication between your corporate network and mobile devices comply with security standards and design server consolidation plans by means of virtualization. In this way, you will be able to standardize the operating systems in use, you’ll be able to deploy new software without affecting productivity and plan for future implementations of virtualization technology.

Deploy host-based firewalls on each device on the network. Establish protocols both for remote connections as policies for communications between servers in a secure manner. Likewise, extend the monitoring to all servers (not just critical ones) and define service levels for their correct performance. Complementing the centralized - firewall with host-based firewalls will tend to a greater protection of data traffic, at the same time you achieve that all remote connections that are secured and encrypted so that only trusted users may have access.

Make security backups of all the servers in your platform (not only the critical ones), and if necessary, implement data backup of all your branch offices. Also, deploy a centralized management for the monitoring of your backup processes. This way you will be able to protect the information on all your servers in the estimated recovery times.

Establish processes for service level management, deployment, system administration, networking, and scheduling jobs on your platform. With this you will achieve the delivery of your IT services aligned to business needs and, finally, you will be able to better coordinate changes in services and network.

Implement two-factor authentication (something you have and something you know), generate processes and procedures for both data classification and evaluation of new software acquisitions. Two-factor authentication will help you improve your security when it comes to accessing your organization's resources. It is also recommended to run data classification programs in order to maintain the confidentiality and integrity of data. Finally, implement best practices focused on conducting periodic security reviews for all new software purchased. This will achieve better management of technical vulnerabilities, security in system files and security in development and support processes.

Design and maintain processes for financial management, availability/continuity of IT service, continuous staff training. Your organization will have controlled processes in terms of monetary resources, availability of IT services and better management of the workforce.

Automate the process of user account provisioning and extend the service of Active Directory to people outside the company. This action will allow you to speed up the process of user creation, both for new users as to external people, who are authorized to access the resources of the organization.

Implement processes to plan, analyze and optimize the capacity of your enterprise servers. Match your mobile device management processes to your desktop management processes. Lastly, deploy virtualization technology in your production environment. These practices will allow you to plan the demand of your future needs, managing costs of resources in a proactive manner, besides, you will increase your productivity by having a better workload balance between servers.

Generate policies and processes for threat management and damage mitigation through containment practices of infected devices. Also, it’s advisable to monitor service levels based on systematized reporting. With clearly defined processes you will diminish the probability of being infecting by malware o fall under the control of a cybercriminal.

Create and maintain backup and restore practices for the information stored in your desktop devices. Performing careful backup planning will help prevent data loss (such as hard disk failures, power outages, viruses, and so on). In turn, you will have agile and simple file recovery processes.

Implement an advanced version of two-factor authentication with three combination options (for example, a biometric plus a password or a pin plus a Smart Card or a fingerprint scan plus a hardware token). This measure provides greater access protection to your organization's data and resources and could be optimized with multifactor authentication.

The company has the basic office to operate. Start using corporate mail in the cloud considered. Additional, enable the presence of your company on the web.

If you do not have administrative systems, payroll, accounting, etc. consider deploying them on cloud platforms. Finally, if you do not have technical personnel in the company hire a person, internal or external, to support you in the implementation of IT services.

Your company probably has applications that support most business processes. Your next step now is to evaluate which of these applications are able to migrate to the cloud. Assess the adoption of collaborative tools in the cloud among its employees and defined a strategy that includes policies on computer security and sensitive data management of the organization. Finally, consolidate (if you have not already done so) your different sources of information in a data warehouse.

The company must have a strategic IT plan in the short and medium term that includes:
- Hybrid cloud (private and public)
- Cybersecurity Strategies
- Defined policies for backing up information in the cloud
- Contingency plans for mission critical information systems
- Tools to develop business intelligence in the cloud

Implementing Exchange Online through Office 365 as a communication platform allows you to send secure emails and create instant business meetings. This platform adds a professional format and is more efficient for interacting with your clients.

Through SharePoint Online, you share and manage content to strengthen communications with your company’s customers. You will also have the benefit of saving costs on infrastructure, greater security and backup of information.

Yammer is the social network of Office 365 with which your company can be in contact and interact with your clients in a professional manner. You will be able to create groups or external dedicated networks which facilitates continuous collaboration providing client-specific information as needed.

Having on-going and secure communication allows your company to stay at the forefront of technology. , In addition, having your applications hosted in the cloud allows for access to better business solutions.

With Microsoft Forms it is possible to create forms, surveys, questionnaires and see the results immediately. This helps to have an immediate analysis of the results since you can export the information to Excel.

Implementing a marketing campaign through Azure allows for mass sending of emails to your customers in a shorter time frame. And since it is cloud-based, a greater level of security will be guaranteed.
Office 365 offers a number of services and communication applications that will improve the interaction between you and your customers.

Having active communication platforms with customers gives added value to your services. We invite you to continue with this process through Microsoft cloud-based apps included in Office 365 such as Forms, Yammer or creating your own website on Azure.
Using Microsoft Forms helps to respond to customer surveys more quickly, enhancing customer satisfaction.

With Office 365 you have access to information from any location using every kind of device available (Laptop, PC, Tablet, Smartphone). In addition, you can connect Office 365 with Azure and access a database showing the results of interactions with customers allowing for easier data analysis.
We encourage you to use Power BI as a platform for data mining. This allows the company to create reports and provide professional analyses based on customer surveys.

Create and quickly start digital campaigns that scale automatically based on customer demand. Analyze and improve the effectiveness of campaigns with the versatility of data analysis.

Implementing Office 365 in your company allows you to work from any location, at any time and from any device. You will have at your disposal a set of known productivity tools and first-class tools for conferences and teamwork within your company.

Microsoft Office 365 offers the power of cloud productivity to businesses of all sizes, helping to save time, money and freeing up valuable resources. Office 365 combines the well-known Office Desktop Suite with Microsoft's cloud-based versions of next-generation communications and collaboration services.

By using Office 365 you access your data, email, documents, contacts, business social network and calendars anywhere in the world. Office 365 combines the well-known Office Desktop Suite with Microsoft's cloud-based versions of next-generation communications and collaboration services.

Communicate and collaborate easily inside and outside your organization makes your company more competitive. Office 365 combines the well-known Office Desktop Suite with Microsoft's cloud-based versions of next-generation communications and collaboration services

Office 365 allows any person with access to share information from any location or device regardless of whether it is a cell phone, tablet, laptop or desktop computer. It will also allow each user to install up to 15 devices.

With Office 365 subscription plans, you will have complete versions of Office applications: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Outlook, Publisher and Access. You can install Office 365 in many devices, including PC and Mac, Android Smartphones and tablets, iPad and iPhone.

Office 365 offers integrated solutions, so everyone can collaborate more effectively no matter the type of device used. Productivity is enhanced with team chat, online meetings, co-authoring and secure file sharing, group mail and a social network.

Office 365 offers integrated solutions, so everyone can collaborate more effectively regardless of the type of device used. Office 365 allows you to keep your data safe and secure, both in transit and at rest. Access control technology provides layers of protection, with several levels of approval and access at the appropriate time with limited authorization and subject to a deadline.

With Office 365, employees reduce the need for team travel with web videoconferences, audio and HD video. Unify your global business telephony system with a complete voice solution with PBX in the cloud in Skype for Business.

Staying connected is more important than ever. With Office 365 you will always have it with applications like Skype for Business. Yammer, Teams, and Exchange Online.  The company provides teams with a simple way to collaborate and share information more effectively.
Use cloud technology in conjunction with any user of the company in projects, initiatives and events. Staying connected is more important now than ever.

With Microsoft Forms, you can create questionnaires and surveys, and see the results easily. By creating a questionnaire or form, you can invite other users to respond with any web browser or even with mobile devices.

Yammer is the Office 365 social network that allows you to add partners, customers and suppliers to group conversations requiring specific information. For on-going collaboration, create dedicated external groups or networks to facilitate closer relationships and a sense of community.

Microsoft has different tools like Power BI that allows you to analyze the data collected through social networks. You will be able to create plans to improve your business process based on the Power BI reports.

Going beyond the standard of the preventive maintenance industry, offering predictive and even preferential maintenance, so that you can guarantee better quality with your services makes you unique in the global market. Implementing SharePoint Online results in instantaneous reports and connects your partners and employees with an intranet. Share common resources and applications and spread your message with dynamic webpages.

Implement Dynamics 365 to automate your business processes. Quickly create applications, automate workflows and incorporate additional information on your company with Microsoft's enterprise application platform.
Get more productivity by seamlessly connecting your business process data with Office 365 and LinkedIn data for use in familiar tools such as Outlook, Excel and Power BI.

With Microsoft you can choose different modular applications designed for specific processes, roles and sectors that will help you solve business problems and make the transition to the cloud more easily.

Implement Azure Active Directory. This service unifies user authentication, resource, applications and data access from a single user account. The purpose is to have greater control of the user accounts, managing them from a centralized site.

Implement Group Policy Settings (GPO) in a timely manner with Azure Active Directory. The use of GPO eases the rapid and efficient deployment of security settings and updates to the devices of the organization.

Automate the process of provisioning user accounts and extend the Azure Active Directory service to people external to the company. This action will allow you to speed up the process of creating accounts, both for new users and for external people who are authorized to access the organization’s resources.

Automate the process of provisioning user accounts and extend the Azure Active Directory service to people external to the company. Azure Active Directory Premium includes all the features of the other editions of Azure Active Directory and are enhanced with advanced identity protection and privileged identity management functionalities.

With System Center Operations Manager and Configuration Manager, you will obtain a complete tool for the monitoring and deployment of software in both client devices and servers. Implant virtualization technologies in your production environment. Create applications protection policies that help protect your company’s data.   With Microsoft Intune you control access to your company’s information with multiple methods of authentication. Migrate your workloads to Azure which will be more flexible and easier to manage and they will also be protected with Azure Site Recovery.

Use antivirus software on desktop devices as well as a centralized firewall for the protection of network devices. Windows Defender reinforces attack entry points by isolating malware and other threats to data, applications and infrastructure.

Deploy host-based firewalls on each device on the network with Microsoft Intune which allows you to create customized exceptions for each device. Establish protocols for both remote connections and communications policies between servers in a secure manner.

Generate policies and processes for threat management and damage mitigation through the practice of isolating infected devices. Microsoft Intune can help you protect devices managed with Endpoint Protection, which also provides real-time protection against malware threats. It keeps malware definitions updated and automatically scans the devices.

Microsoft Intune can help you protect devices managed with Endpoint Protection, which also provides real-time protection against malware threats. It also keeps malware definitions updated. Windows Malicious Software Removal Tool (MSRT) helps maintain Windows devices free of malware.

Azure provides automated network services (DNS and DHCP). Define monitoring processes for critical servers of your infrastructure with Operations Management Suite. This protects your network against malicious software and improves IP address and domain name resolution management. You will also achieve greater control over critical servers, avoiding decreases in performance or service interruptions.

With Operations management Suite, extend the monitoring to all the servers (not only critical ones) and define service levels for their proper functioning. Complementing the centralized firewall with host-based firewalls results in greater protection of data traffic, while ensuring that all remote connections are secure and encrypted so that only trusted users can access them.

It is advisable to monitor service levels based on systematic reporting. With clearly defined processes, you will decrease the likelihood of being infected by malware or fall under the control of a cybercriminal.
No recommendation required.
Implement practices and processes to create security copies and backups of critical servers. With Azure Backup, you will have a redundant security copy of the critical information of your business.

Implement Azure Backup to secure and obtain redundant copies of the information on all the servers of your platform (not only critical ones).  If necessary, implement Azure Site Recovery to prevent information loss or service interruption due to natural disasters. Also, with Azure Backup you will have at your disposal a centralized management for the monitoring of the backup processes. This will allow you to protect the information of all your servers within the estimated recovery times.

Create and maintain backup and restoration processes of the information stored in your desktop devices.  With Azure Backup, you will have redundant copies of all the information and a centralized management of your data. The use of Azure Site Recovery for the careful planning of operations backup will favor data loss prevention (i.e.: hard drive failures, power outages, viruses, among others). In turn, you will have a simple file recovery process.

Create and maintain backup and restoration processes of the information stored in all your devices (client and servers).  With Azure Backup, you will have redundant copies of all the information and a centralized management of your data. The use of Azure Site Recovery for the careful planning of operations backup will favor data loss prevention (i.e.: hard drive failures, power outages, viruses, among others). In turn, you will have a simple file recovery process.

Implement the combination of System Center Configuration Manager and System Center Service Manager for change and support management.

Establish processes for Service Level management, Deployment management, system administration, network and task programming in the platform. By implementing Azure Automation & Control, you will achieve delivery of your IT services aligned to your company’s business needs.    Additionally, you will be in a better position to coordinate changes in services and the network.

Implement Azure Automation to have consistent control across configuration, updates and change management.  This will allow you to maintain better processes in availability/continuity of IT services, and in on-going training of personnel. Your organization will have controlled processes in matters of monetary resources, IT service availability and more effective workforce management.

Implement Azure Automation to have   consistent control across configuration and updates and change management.  This will allow you to more effectively maintain processes in availability/continuity of IT services, and in on-going training of personnel. Your organization will have controlled processes in matters of monetary resources, IT service availability and more effective workforce management.

Implement System Center Service Manager for incident (both for detection and mitigation), changes, services and settings management. This will help you to provide a disciplined process to introduce changes into the IT environment with minimal interruptions to the operation.

Deploying a combination of System Center Configuration Manager and System Center Service Manager will allow you to develop processes for Service Level management, Deployment management, system administration, network and task programming in the platform. With this you will achieve the delivery of your IT services aligned to the business needs.  Additionally, you will be able to better coordinate the changes in services and the network.

Use Azure Automation in your environment for incident management and handling. You will have clear and concise processes that will allow you to resolve incidents within the established time. Also, System Center Service Manager provides you with an integrated platform for automation and adaptation of recommended IT service management procedures for your organization.

Azure Automation offers the possibility to automate all cloud management tasks that require too much time, are frequent, and prone to errors. This automation helps you focus on work that can add business value. Reducing errors and maximizing efficiency also contributes to the reduction of operation costs.

Develop security, risk assessment and incident management policies and procedures. Implement Azure Security Center for a centralized monitoring of all workloads in your environment (local, cloud or hybrid).

Implement Azure Security Center not only to have a centralized monitoring of your environment, but also to maintain an active and constant search of any vulnerabilities that may exist in your network.   Document the relevant information of the vulnerabilities found.

Use Azure Security Center in your network to detect attacks that may occur. Through the Microsoft Security Graph, you will be aware of cyberattacks that are constantly changing. The Azure Security Center also has interactive and intelligence tools to assess the risks present in your network.

Azure Security Center helps you maintain and/or improve these good practices. The Microsoft Security Graph will alert you to cyberattacks that are constantly changing.  The Azure Security Center also has interactive and intelligence tools to assess the risks present in your network.

Use Azure storage services to have all sensitive information in the cloud. Additionally, implement the Azure Active Directory to authorize   only specific users with their respective passwords to access the information.

Implement Azure Information Protection to classify the sensitive information of the company. Not only will you identify which information is more important, but you will also be able to define permissions to limit the number of people who can access said information.

Increase the Security of the information stored in Azure by means of using Azure Multi-Factor Authentication. This service will provide you an additional level of security by asking for a second (or even third) method of user verification.
No recommendation required.

Office 365 provides Exchange online which is a web-based corporate email. This service allows you to store, synchronize and share all your files online to keep them always updated. In addition. you will be able to edit documents online thanks to the Office online version.

Office 365 includes Exchange Online, a web-based email which is more flexible and easy to configure than the on-premise version. It also contains other online tools such as SharePoint (collaborative platform) or Skype for  Business (a communication channel).

Evaluate which of these applications is ready for the cloud. Then define a strategy in parallel with cybersecurity policies to protect the company’s sensitive data.  A Microsoft Consultant will help you with the process.

Move these applications to the cloud with Microsoft. Improve the relationship with your clients and the productivity of your employees with a wide variety of communication tools like web-based corporate email (Exchange online), collaborative platform (SharePoint online), social network for business (Yammer) and video conferencing (Skype for Business), all-inclusive in Office 365.
Please contact one of Microsoft consultants for a better understanding of Microsoft services in the cloud.

Microsoft Dynamics 365 helps you to centralize staff information, business data and all their processes. A number of cloud-based applications unify the capacity of CRM and ERP to help you manage your business more efficiently.

Improve the security of your datacenter with SQL Azure which offers the same functionality as the on-premise version plus the benefits of cloud computing. Microsoft Dynamics 365 helps you to centralize staff information, business data and all their processes.

Dynamics 365 Enterprise provides access to the full range of Microsoft Dynamics 365 capabilities, including sales, marketing and customer service (unlimited access to Microsoft Social Engagement, Unified Service Desk and Microsoft Dynamics Marketing). There is user-friendly integration with SQL Azure, which offers the same functionality as SQL Server.
Please contact one of Microsoft consultants for better understanding about Microsoft services in the cloud.

Office 365 includes Exchange Online designed for organizations, like yours, to exploit all the benefits of email as a cloud-based service, without sacrificing the robust hardware capabilities required by the Exchange server.
Office 365, apart from having email in the cloud, provides tools such as OneDrive with greater storage in the cloud for its users, and SharePoint to share files in your company's intranet.

Apart from the regular apps of Office 365 like Office Online, Exchange Online, OneDrive, Microsoft has three new business apps that make Office 365 more valuable for your organization:  Microsoft connections (email marketing service); Microsoft Listings (an easy way to publish business information on top sites); and, Microsoft invoicing (create professional invoices and get paid more quickly).
Migrate your email to the cloud. Exchange Online is Microsoft's corporate cloud-based email that is easy to integrate with the other Office tools with a large storage capacity and easy configuration.

Office 365 Business Premium grants you 1TB of storage capacity in OneDrive for each user.  In addition, you will have shared sites in your intranet with SharePoint Online. It also has Skype for Business as an instant messaging communication service.
With Skype for Business you are allowed calls with up to 250 participants irrespective of the organization and the type of Skype account they have. This service is included in Office 365.

Acquire Skype for Business in an Office 365 Enterprise plan.   This instant messaging service for companies allows users to create and / or join video conferences, have calls with up to 250 participants, and to configure their accounts to use IP telephony, among countless other benefits.
Please contact one of Microsoft consultants for a better understanding about Microsoft services in the cloud.
With Planner and Groups of Office 365 you have tools to distribute in an orderly way work groups in different projects of your company, thus providing for more efficient planning and administration.

With Microsoft Azure you have all your development platforms centralized, easy integration with all Microsoft products and best of all, you will only have to pay for what you use with the pay-as-you-go model.
Backup all your data with Azure Backup simply and reliably. With Azure Disaster Recovery you will always have your information protected and supported by the different Microsoft data centers.
Publish your website quickly with Microsoft Azure.
Publish your website with Microsoft Azure.  With Azure you only pay for what you use. In those months with low demand on your site, you pay less and save more.
Microsoft offers different analytical tools, such as Power BI, which allows you to obtain statistics from your users on social networks and perform analyzes on these data more easily and quickly.

Analyze, create reports and graphs, perform business intelligence on the data collected from your users in social networks in an effortless way with Power BI. Quickly connect and collect log data from various sources with Azure Log Analytics.
Move to the cloud to achieve benefits such as: energy savings, zero maintenance costs, 0% data loss and greater security and disaster protection.  Begin with Office 365 and Azure.

Microsoft Dynamics 365 allows you to centralize the information of your employees, the business data and the processes. Power BI provides interactive visualizations with business intelligence capabilities, allowing end users to create reports for themselves, without having to rely on IT staff or database administrators.

Optimize your information systems by integrating Power Bi and Dynamics CRM with Office 365. Use Skype for Business, SharePoint, Planner, and Groups to keep all communication applications between systems and users synchronized.

Optimize your information systems by integrating Power Bi and Dynamics CRM with Office 365. Use Skype for Business, SharePoint, Planner, and Groups to keep all communication applications between systems and users synchronized. Power BI provides interactive visualizations with business intelligence capabilities, allowing end users to create reports for themselves

Starting with Microsoft in the cloud does not require external support to your company. A Microsoft partner and different tutorials will help you through a simple implementation process. Contact one of Microsoft consultants to receive advice.

With Microsoft tools in the cloud you will always have the latest versions of the products, automatic updates and 24/7 support, which will allow the IT team to focus on the critical needs of the organization.

By having the IT infrastructure in the cloud with Microsoft, your company saves in physical equipment expenses and maintenance time. This allows you to use these resources (personnel and money saved) in other strategic areas of your company.

By having the IT infrastructure in the cloud with Microsoft, your company not only saves on maintenance costs of physical equipment, it also optimizes processes in functional areas of the company and improves their quality. Invest the time and money saved in other strategic areas of your organization.

With Azure Active Directory that has security benefits such as multi-factor authentication, conditional access among others, the administration of your platform by your IT team will be much simpler, more efficient and safer.
Planner, Power BI, StaffHub are tools that will help you create strategies and work plans in your organization with statistics and simple data management.

StaffHub helps you manage and schedule daily tasks, as well as manage the sharing of information. With Microsoft Flow, create automated workflows between applications and services. With the notifications service, productivity is increased  and IT administration is facilitated.

Quickly create and publish custom business applications for the web and mobile devices with PowerApps. Manage daily tasks with StaffHub and create workflows with Microsoft Flow. With the notifications service, productivity is increased, and IT administration is facilitated
Please contact one of Microsoft consultants for better understanding about Microsoft services in the cloud.
Please contact one of consultants for better understanding about Microsoft services in the cloud such as reliability, security, and easy administration.
Azure offers a free month trial to test the different services offered. Contact one of our Microsoft consultants to receive advice about Microsoft services in the cloud.

It is good to know that you are aware of the benefits of cloud technologies. Microsoft, on the other hand, gives you greater benefits in terms of security, flexibility and scalability. Contact one of Microsoft consultants to receive more information about all the benefits of Microsoft in the cloud.

Inbound Logistics
Involve relationships with suppliers and include all the activities required to receive, store, and disseminate inputs.

Operations
Are all the activities required to transform inputs into outputs (products and services).

Outbound Logistics

Marketing & Sales
Activities inform buyers about products and services, induce buyers to purchase them, and facilitate their purchase.

After-sales Service
Includes all the activities required to keep the product or service working effectively for the buyer after it is sold and delivered.
